lead_paragraph: Watching a second straight loss to last-place Tampa Bay convinced the New York Yankees it was time to shift more fully into sell mode. So late Saturday night, owner Hal Steinbrenner gave the go-ahead.

headline.print_headline: Yankees Admit MLB Has Changed, Start to Retool for Future
headline.main: Yankees Admit MLB Has Changed, Start to Retool for Future
